players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and knows who the mafioso is. I believe Diana is the mafioso based on my investigation."
Diana: "I have no reason to suspect anyone at the moment, but we need to stay vigilant and work together as a team."
You: "Based on the information we have so far, it seems that one of us is lying or trying to mislead us. Let's keep an open mind and consider all possibilities before jumping to conclusions."
Diana: "Let's not jump to conclusions based on speculation. We should focus on gathering more information and keeping an open mind."
Charlie: "I will continue to investigate and gather more evidence. We need to be cautious and not accuse anyone without solid proof."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
